Rules
(Shamelessly stolen from The Bulge and adapted for this game)

General
  1. I am the Mod and what I say goes. I reserve the right to change the rules or modkill/force-replace players as I see fit. If this happens, all players will be made aware of this fact.
  2. That being said, I'm not perfect. If I've messed up or you have any problems or questions, feel free to PM me.
  3. Preface all in-thread messages to the mod with @Mod.
  4. Punishment for breaking any of the following rules is on a case-by-case basis and is therefore not fixed.
  5. This is a game. Play to win, and don't ruin it for others.
  6. DO NOT TALK ABOUT ONGOING GAMES.

Posting and Voting
  1. I hereby reserve the colour #FF6000 for mod use. Don't use it.
  2. Do not use invisible, encrypted, or ridiculously small text. Everything posted in the game thread should be public.
  3. All votes must be written in bold or use the VOTE: Player tag. Unvotes are helpful, but not necessary.
  4. Votes may not be contained inside quote, code, area, or spoiler tags.
  5. A lynch is reached when a majority of all players (half rounded down plus one) are voting for the same target.
  6. If a majority is not reached by the deadline, a No Lynch will occur.

Activity and Deadlines
  1. Failure to post within 48 hours without advance notice will result in a prod.
  2. You have 24 hours to respond to a prod, lest you be replaced. Regardless, three prods will result in a force-replacement.
  3. If your role gives you access to a Private Topic, you may request that a partner be poked. This will not count as an official prod.
  4. Please give notice of V/LA in-thread or via PM.
  5. Each Day Phase will last two weeks (14 days) and Night Phase will last 48 hours. Extensions may be given in case of replacements.
  6. A missed Night Action will result in a No Action.

Game Setup
  1. This game will start with 13 players and will be a confirmed 3:1:9 setup.
  2. Please see the Normal Game Wiki for further description of what constitutes a normal game on MafiaScum.

So let's start with the things that feel simple to me: EV is my strongest townread. It started here, which feels satisfyingly open in a way that posts like that often really don't. The primary reason, though, is that I'm pretty sure that this unguarded-looking comment shows that, if the mafia in this game had pregame chat, EV is no such mafia. How to approach a game with an SK is sure to be at the top of the list for mafia pregame chat; I doubt very much that mafia would be able to fake lack of knowledge about the setup. That's making an assumption about pregame chat but I can't remember the last game that I saw where mafia couldn't talk in pregame, so I'm just going to go ahead and assume. It also doesn't rule out SK but other EV posts (and scumminess elsewhere) make me happy to not worry about that.
